name: Darkness Sign "Demarcation"
desc:
Rumia teleports across the map and summons two minions to help her. Sets Fog of War.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Wolf Sign "Star Ring Pounce"
desc:
Kagerou teleports across the map and summons 2 afterimages. She also becomes much stronger.
Capture Bonus: 200 Bonus EXP

name: Flying Head "Multiplicative Head"
desc:
Sekibanki respawns and surrounds your units with her head minions.
Capture Bonus: 100 Bonus EXP

name: Evening Sign "Darting Nightjars"
desc:
Mystia intensifies the night blindness of the party, making them more susceptible to enemy attacks. All player/ally units -2 Def.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Carapace Sign "Hercules Beetle"
desc:
Wriggle gathers insects from around the forest to form a protective carapace for herself. Halves damage from attacks and inflicts all units she strikes with "Infest".
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Moon-Viewing Sake "Lunatic September"
desc:
Ringo teleports behind your army with a moon rabbit extermination crew.
Capture Bonus: 100 Bonus EXP

name: Bullet Sign "Eagle Shooting"
desc:
Seiran spawns a crew of moon rabbits and randomly swaps her soldiers' positions with random units under your control.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: "Ancient Duper"
desc:
Tewi will spawn enemies around the map. Every attack that you or an opponent makes will incur a random effect.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: *You've Already Gone Mad!*
desc:
Reisen will respawn with higher stats and inflict two random player units with Lunacy.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Mechanics Sign: Newton's First Gift
desc:
Chiyuri spawns in a special boss and imposes "Friction Shift" on all units, decreasing their damage dealt and speed for each tile moved.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Mechanics Sign: Joule's Revelation
desc:
Yumemi will respawn in the same position she spawned in, and will now impose "Decreasing Work Efficiency", decreasing their movement by 2.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Devil Sign: Tour Guide From the Underworld!
desc:
Louise teleports to the top of the peak in the middle of the map and summons an array of demons around the map.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Grimoire of Alice: Makai Synchrogazer
desc:
Alice powers up and summons an array of totems around the map that neutralize either physical or magic units.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Blizzard Sign: Brave Storm
desc:
Mai will envelop herself with an aura that gives all units on the map -15 Avoid/Crit Avoid. 
Capture Bonus: 200 Bonus Exp

name: Dream Slicer
desc:
Yumeko augments herself with Makai magic. Her attacks become Splash 1 and inflict Bleeding on targets. Also gains +2 Mov and Vantage.
Capture Bonus: 500 Bonus Exp

name: Triad of Magic
desc:
Alice summons 3 Tsukumogami armed with Bolting in a triangle formation.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Lockdown Zone!
desc:
Sara reduces the Mov of all enemies in a 3 tile radius by 99. Enemies in the Lockdown Zone receive -3 AS.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Shuraken "1st Form"
desc:
Youmu retreats backwards and powers up to a stronger form.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Shuraken "2nd Form"
desc:
Pushed back further, Youmu increases the ferocity of her attacks.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Shuraken "3rd Form"
desc:
Youmu unleashes her full final power.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Cold and Hot "Samidare Broiler"
desc:
Yuki and Mai combine their powers to create an aura of simultaneous hot and cold; applying Burning and Frozen to all enemies.
Capture Bonus: 200 Bonus Exp

name: Cold and Hot "Samidare Broiler"
desc:
Yuki and Mai combine their powers to create an aura of simultaneous hot and cold; applying Burning and Frozen to all enemies.
Capture Bonus: 200 Bonus Exp

name: Orreries Solar System
desc:
Mima expands her attack and applies Blast 3 to all hits she performs.
Capture Bonus: 200 Bonus Exp

name: Makai Maid Madness
desc:
Shinki teleports away and summons her Makai maid squadron.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Strings of Oumagatoki
desc:
Shinki summons Alice and a squadron of dolls to defend herself.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

name: Hour of Demons: Oumagatoki
desc:
Shinki unleashes the waking, walking demons of Makai upon the enemy in a final blow.
Capture Bonus: Mandatory

desc: Enemies within 3 tiles: Cannot use magical weapons.

name: Looter
desc: This unit will destroy villages and/or loot treasure chests.

desc: User is protected by youma arts from taking damage for one turn.

name: Eclipse Helper
desc:
In order for enemies to use Eclipse, they must think they're inflicting a negative status or dealing damage.
Eclipse doesn't deal damage normally, so instead it secretly inflicts this status.

desc:
Skill gained by equipping the Devil Axe.
Receives damage equal to damage dealt.

desc:
Skill gained by equipping the Devil Axe.

desc: Gives +50% crit.

desc: Gains 100 Gold after combat. Loses 50 Gold when hit.

desc: Strikes 8 times. 20 HP Recoil.

desc: Strikes 8 times.

desc:
Youmu slashes through up to 5 tiles to reach her opponent in battle, damaging any enemies in the way. Cannot double.

desc:

desc:

desc:
Youmu unleashes a series of 7 slashes onto an opponent at half damage.

desc:

desc:

desc:
Youmu enters parry stance, reducing damage taken to 25% of the original at the cost of halving her own damage.

desc: Youmu enters parry stance, reducing damage taken to 25% of the original at the cost of halving her own damage when defending.

desc:

desc: Youmu becomes unable to dodge, but her counterattacks go first, do 1.5x as much damage and her crit rate raises by 30%.
